64a6('bum): bar rtog pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag go zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal
64a7('bum): lo zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag do zhes bya bar ston/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug go zhes bya bar ston cing / 'di skad du gang de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do zhes rjod de/ su la bstan pa de
64b1('bum): dag kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
64b2('bum): sdug ces bya bar rtog par 'gyur ro/ / de ltar de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag go zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug bsngal lo zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bdag do zhes bya bar rtog pa dang / rnam pa
64b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sdug go zhes bya bar rtog pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan la spyod par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag
64b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i
64b5('bum): sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis bsam
64b6('bum): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa
64b7('bum): dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa
65a1('bum): gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
65a2('bum): khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang /
65a3('bum): sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
65a4('bum): dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// tshur rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khyod kyis sbyin pa'i
65a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa dang / sa gsum pa dang / sa bzhi pa dang / sa lnga pa dang / sa drug pa dang / sa bdun pa dang / sa brgyad pa dang / sa dgu pa dang / sa
65a6('bum): bcu pa la gnas par 'gyur ro/ / zhes de yang mtshan ma'i tshul dang / pa'i tshul gyis ston te/ de dus kyi 'du shes kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par 'gyur te/ kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// kau shi ka
65a7('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
65b1('bum): shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes ston te/ kau shi ka de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan no// kau shi
65b2('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston na/ 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
65b3('bum): sgoms shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par 'jug par 'gyur ro// skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// khyod kyis de ltar skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa dang / byang chub sems
65b4('bum): dpa'i mngon par shes pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes/ rigs
65b5('bum): kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na 'di skad ston te/ rigs kyi bu dag su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing / 'chang ba dang / klog cing kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid
65b6('bum): la byed pa de ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad grangs dpag tu par 'gyur ro zhes zer te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la ston na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
65b7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
66a1('bum): rnams kyis thugs dang po bskyed pa nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar gyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/ rjes su dga' bar gyis la/ bla
66a2('bum): na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngos shig ces rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag de ltar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar ston na/ rigs
66a3('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu
66a4('bum): 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs rtag ces
66a5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
66a6('bum): gang yin pa de la ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la gzugs nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab
66a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/
66b1('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
66b2('bum): po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la tshor ba nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
66b3('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
66b4('bum): la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'du shes rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du shes ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du shes
66b5('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du shes rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la 'du shes nyid
66b6('bum): kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/
66b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'du byed rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/
67a1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du byed
67a2('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la 'du byed nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi
67a3('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam
67a4('bum): par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
67a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
67a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
67a7('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos
67b1('bum): po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau
67b2('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
67b3('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma ltar shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong
67b4('bum): ste/ rna ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rna ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la rna ba nyid kyang
67b5('bum): na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub
67b6('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna
67b7('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba
68a1('bum): so/ / de la sna nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
68a2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
68a3('bum): lce rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
68a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la lce nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes
68a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
68a6('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa
68a7('bum): de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la lus nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
68b1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi
68b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa
68b3('bum): de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la yid nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta
68b4('bum): ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
68b5('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
68b6('bum): gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la gzugs nyid
68b7('bum): kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
69a1('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sgra rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgra ni rang
69a2('bum): bzhin gyis stong ste/ sgra'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sgra rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la sgra nyid kyang na/ rtag
69a3('bum): pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
69a4('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dri rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dri ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dri'i rang bzhin
69a5('bum): gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dri rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la dri nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta
69a6('bum): ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang
69a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ro rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ro ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ro'i rang bzhin
69b1('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ro rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba dmigs so// de la ro nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga
69b2('bum): la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi
69b3('bum): bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ reg rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg ni rang bzhin gyis
69b4('bum): stong ste/ reg gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ reg rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la
69b5('bum): reg nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu
69b6('bum): mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
69b7('bum): ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chos
70a1('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la chos nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
70a2('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyi
70a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
70a4('bum): po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
70a5('bum): na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang
70a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
70a7('bum): rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
70b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de
70b2('bum): dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshul
70b3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos
70b4('bum): po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la sna'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa
70b5('bum): 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
70b6('bum): kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i rnam par
70b7('bum): shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba
71a1('bum): 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
71a2('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
71a3('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po
71a4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag
71a5('bum): pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
71a6('bum): rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
71a7('bum): zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa
71b1('bum): de la ni/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
71b2('bum): tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha
71b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po
71b4('bum): pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces
71b5('bum): ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/
71b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna
71b7('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba
72a1('bum): so/ / de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston
72a2('bum): to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
72a3('bum): shig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab
72a4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bya ba so// de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar
72a5('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
72a6('bum): 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rang
72a7('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa nyid
72b1('bum): kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
72b2('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
72b3('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag
72b4('bum): ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi
72b5('bum): ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
72b6('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
72b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/
73a1('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
73a2('bum): ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gi
73a3('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba
73a4('bum): so/ / de la gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka
73a5('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg
73a6('bum): pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ dngos
73a7('bum): po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so// de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang
73b1('bum): na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg
73b2('bum): pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe
73b3('bum): na/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
73b4('bum): pa de la ni/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
73b5('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
73b6('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin
73b7('bum): gyis stong ste/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag
74a1('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
74a2('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
74a3('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lus kyi 'dus te
74a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag
74a5('bum): ces bya ba so/ / de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//
74a6('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yid kyi 'dus
74a7('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o//
74b1('bum): dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba nyid kyang na/
74b2('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/
74b3('bum): bam po drug pa// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
74b4('bum): shig/ sa'i khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
74b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la sa'i khams nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab
74b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
74b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chu'i khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chu'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chu'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi
75a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni chu'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba dmigs so// de la chu'i khams nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston
75a2('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
75a3('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos
75a4('bum): po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ khams rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la khams nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar
75a5('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
75a6('bum): ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rlung gi khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rlung gi khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
75a7('bum): pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rlung gi khams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la rlung gi khams nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/
75b1('bum): kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
75b2('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nam mkha'i khams kyi rang
75b3('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ nam mkha'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so// de la nam mkha'i
75b4('bum): khams nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de
75b5('bum): dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya bar yang dag
75b6('bum): par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i khams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab
75b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa'i khams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te// kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i
76a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
76a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ma rig pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ma rig pa'i rang bzhin
76a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ ma rig pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la ma rig pa nyid kyang na/
76a4('bum): rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
76a5('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'du byed rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed ni rang bzhin
76a6('bum): gyis stong ste/ 'du byed kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'du byed rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so//
76a7('bum): de la 'du byed nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
76b1('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
76b2('bum): rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/
76b3('bum): rtag ces bya ba so// de la rnam par shes pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
76b4('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dang gzugs rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
76b5('bum): su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dang gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni
76b6('bum): dang gzugs rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la dang gzugs nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
76b7('bum): ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ skye
77a1('bum): mched drug rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye mched drug ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye mched drug gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
77a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni skye mched drug rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba mi so// de la skye mched drug nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi
77a3('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar
77a4('bum): ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ reg pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ reg pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ reg pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o//
77a5('bum): dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ reg pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la reg pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
77a6('bum): te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
77a7('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshor ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba ni rang bzhin
77b1('bum): gyis stong ste/ tshor ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni tshor ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la tshor
77b2('bum): ba nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems
77b3('bum): dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sred pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sred pa ni
77b4('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sred pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sred pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so//
77b5('bum): de la sred pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
77b6('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ len pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
77b7('bum): zhe na/ len pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ len pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni len pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba
78a1('bum): so/ / de la len pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
78a2('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ srid pa rtag ces bya bar yang
78a3('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ srid pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni srid pa rtag
78a4('bum): ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la srid pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
78a5('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ skye ba rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su
78a6('bum): ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skye ba ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ skye ba'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni skye ba rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag
78a7('bum): ces bya ba so/ / de la skye ba nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
78b1('bum): dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rga shi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
78b2('bum): su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rga shi'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rga shi rtag ces bya ba
78b3('bum): 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la rga shi nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
78b4('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces
78b5('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi
78b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu
78b7('bum): 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
79a1('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
79a2('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces
79a3('bum): bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston
79a4('bum): to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bzod
79a5('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni
79a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
79a7('bum): te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de
79b1('bum): dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
79b2('bum): phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ brtson 'grus
79b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi so/ / de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes
79b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
79b5('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol
79b6('bum): tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba
79b7('bum): so/ / de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka
80a1('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
80a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni
80a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau
80a4('bum): shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab
80a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin
80a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la nang stong pa nyid kyang na rtag
80a7('bum): pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs
80b1('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyi stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin
80b2('bum): gyis stong ste/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni phyi stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so// de
80b3('bum): la phyi stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
80b4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir
80b5('bum): zhe na/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ phyi nang stong pa nyid rtag ces
80b6('bum): bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka
80b7('bum): gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag
81a1('bum): ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
81a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs
81a3('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
81a4('bum): phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chen po stong pa
81a5('bum): nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o/ / dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ chen po stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so//
81a6('bum): de la chen po stong pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston te// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs
81a7('bum): kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig// don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang
81b1('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ don dam pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
81b2('bum): phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ don dam pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba// rtag ces bya ba so// de la don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag
81b3('bum): ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
81b4('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi rang
81b5('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so// de la
81b6('bum): 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs
81b7('bum): kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'dus ma byas
82a1('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos
82a2('bum): po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am
82a3('bum): mi rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg
82a4('bum): pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de
82a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
82a6('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
82a7('bum): bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
82b1('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa
82b2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba mi dmigs so//
82b3('bum): de la thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
82b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang
82b5('bum): dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi
82b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ dor ba pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la dor ba pa stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo
82b7('bum): de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur
83a1('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi rang
83a2('bum): bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la rang bzhin
83a3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang na rtag/ pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang
83a4('bum): chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes
83a5('bum): su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
83a6('bum): pa gang yin pa de la ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes
83a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes
83b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
83b2('bum): po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa
83b3('bum): 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
83b4('bum): theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de
83b5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin
83b6('bum): pa de la ni dmigs pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la pa stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi
83b7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
84a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po pa stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang
84a2('bum): yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po pa stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba so// de la dngos po pa stong pa
84a3('bum): nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
84a4('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de
84a5('bum): ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ngo bo nyid
84a6('bum): stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
84a7('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
84b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
84b2('bum): rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am/ rtag ces bya ba
84b3('bum): so/ / de la dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
84b4('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
84b5('bum): rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes
84b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka
84b7('bum): de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
85a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag par spong ba
85a2('bum): rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni yang dag par spong ba rnams rtag
85a3('bum): ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to//
