85a4('bum): kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams
85a5('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85a6('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi
85a7('bum): bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
85b1('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ dbang po rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dbang po rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste dbang po rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab
85b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dbang po rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am ma rtag ces bya ba dmigs so// de la dbang po nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni
85b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu
85b4('bum): khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o//
85b5('bum): dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la stobs nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
85b6('bum): te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
85b7('bum): de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
86a1('bum): ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni byang chub
86a2('bum): kyi yan lag rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang med na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86a3('bum): phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi
86a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
86a5('bum): pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba
86a6('bum): so/ / de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
86a7('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
86b1('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
86b2('bum): phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang med na/ rtag pa 'am/ rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar
86b3('bum): ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol
86b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bsam gtan rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ bsam gtan
86b5('bum): rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni bsam gtan rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la
86b6('bum): bsam gtan nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi
86b7('bum): bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ tshad pa rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
87a1('bum): rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ tshad pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
87a2('bum): gang yin pa de la ni tshad pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la tshad pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
87a3('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu
87a4('bum): phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
87a5('bum): kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so//
87a6('bum): de la gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan mi ston to// kau shi ka gzhan
87a7('bum): yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces
87b1('bum): bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
87b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la rnam par thar pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
87b3('bum): mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs
87b4('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis
87b5('bum): stong ste/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mthar kyis gnas pa'i
87b6('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de
87b7('bum): dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bdun pa// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i
88a1('bum): theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa
88a2('bum): pa rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa'i rang bzhin
88a3('bum): gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba
88a4('bum): so/ / de la rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
88a5('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha
88a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
88a7('bum): pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon par shes pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am mi rtag ces bya ba so// de la mngon par shes pa nyid kyang na/ rtag pa
88b1('bum): 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i
88b2('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ ting nge 'dzin rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
88b3('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni ting nge 'dzin
88b4('bum): rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
88b5('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
88b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po
88b7('bum): pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni gzungs kyi sgo rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang na rtag pa
89a1('bum): 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub
89a2('bum): sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par
89a3('bum): rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89a4('bum): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang na/ rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi
89a5('bum): ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi
89a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jigs pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
89a7('bum): 'jigs pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni 'jigs pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so//
89b1('bum): de la 'jigs pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang
89b2('bum): rigs kyi bu mo/ de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
89b3('bum): rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes
89b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod
89b5('bum): ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
89b6('bum): de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ snying rje chen po rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snying rje chen po ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ snying rje
89b7('bum): chen po'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni snying rje chen po rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la snying rje chen po nyid kyang
90a1('bum): na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo
90a2('bum): de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya
90a3('bum): bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha
90a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
90a5('bum): te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
90a6('bum): la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni
90a7('bum): rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
90b1('bum): rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba mi so/ / de la rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90b2('bum): pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab
90b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos
90b4('bum): po pa'o/ / dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba dmigs so// de la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang na
90b5('bum): rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa
90b6('bum): pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ phyir
90b7('bum): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
91a1('bum): bu rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
91a2('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/
91a3('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dgra bcom pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes
91a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni dgra bcom pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la dgra bcom pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha
91a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms
91a6('bum): shig/ rang byang chub rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang byang chub ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha
91a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rang byang chub rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so/ / de la rang byang chub nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am ma rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
91b1('bum): gzugs brnyan ston to/ / kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
91b2('bum): sgoms shig/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa
91b3('bum): gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya ba so// de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston
91b4('bum): te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes
91b5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar yang dag par rjes su ma lta shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong
91b6('bum): ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtag ces bya ba 'am rtag ces bya
91b7('bum): ba so/ / de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang na rtag pa 'am rtag pa lta ga la yod ces ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka gzhan yang
92a1('bum): rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar ston te/ tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms shig/ chos gang las kyang
92a2('bum): yongs su 'da' bar ma byed cig/ chos gang las kyang gnas par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang las 'da' bar bya ba 'am gang la gnas par bya ba'i chos de la de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar chos
92a3('bum): thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni dngos po pa'o// dngos po pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa de la ni/ blang bar bya ba 'am/ dor bar bya ba 'am/ bskyed par
92a4('bum): bya ba 'am dgag par bya ba'i chos gang yang do zhes ston te/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs brnyan ston to// kau shi ka de bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
92a5('bum): pa'i don bstan par bya ste/ kau shi ka de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po ni ches mang du 'phel gyi/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo snga ma dag gi ni ma yin no// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
92a6('bum): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
92a7('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de
92b1('bum): bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/
92b2('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau
92b3('bum): shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod
92b4('bum): na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
92b5('bum): kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di
92b6('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang
92b7('bum): du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
93a1('bum): byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/
93a2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de
93a3('bum): bstan pa dang bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/
93a4('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur
93a5('bum): bu'i sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/
93a6('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
93a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung
93b1('bum): shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
93b2('bum): kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
93b3('bum): kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom
93b4('bum): ldan 'das mang ngo / / bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa
93b5('bum): dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/
93b6('bum): ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi
93b7('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
94a1('bum): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo /
94a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
94a3('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan
94a4('bum): tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
94a5('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang
94a6('bum): ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang
94a7('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/
94b1('bum): ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'dzam bu gling gi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ gling chen po bzhi'i
94b2('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam//
94b3('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod
94b4('bum): de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid
94b5('bum): la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro//
94b6('bum): kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
94b7('bum): la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang
95a1('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di
95a2('bum): skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches
95a3('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod
95a4('bum): pa lta zhog gi/ stong pa gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
95a5('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
95a6('bum): ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/
95a7('bum): chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
95b1('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi
95b2('bum): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
95b3('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
95b4('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar
95b5('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gsum
95b6('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis
95b7('bum): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
96a1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam
96a2('bum): par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar
96a3('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka
96a4('bum): gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam//

96a6('bum): cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul
96a7('bum): bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ phyir 'ong ba rnams yod par
96b1('bum): 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir 'ong
96b2('bum): ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

96b5('bum): de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong
96b6('bum): gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol

97a1('bum): dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/

97a4('bum): rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas
97a5('bum): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad
97a6('bum): du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na/
97a7('bum): ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa lta zhog
97b1('bum): gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
97b2('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi
97b3('bum): ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs

98b7('bum): dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
99a1('bum): gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can dgra bcom
99a2('bum): pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i
99a3('bum): rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan
99a4('bum): la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid
99a5('bum): la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gnyis
99a6('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam
99a7('bum): du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes
99b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun
99b2('bum): chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99b3('bum): phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
99b4('bum): ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
99b5('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
99b6('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99b7('bum): phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las dgra bcom pa rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs
100a1('bum): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
100a2('bum): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing
100a3('bum): rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes
100a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rang byang
100a5('bum): chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
100a6('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan/ yi ge dang
100a7('bum): ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/
100b1('bum): lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas
100b2('bum): rnams yod par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ rang byang chub
100b3('bum): la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka
100b4('bum): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur
100b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams
100b6('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring
100b7('bum): po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar
101a1('bum): gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol
101a2('bum): zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab
101a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i
101a4('bum): sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i
101a5('bum): bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge
101a6('bum): dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs
101a7('bum): shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod
101b1('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rang byang chub la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
101b2('bum): mo la la zhig gis rang byang chub la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
101b3('bum): stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad
101b4('bum): du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ ces bsgo na ches de'i bsod nams
101b5('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las rang sangs rgyas rnams yod par 'gyur ro// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgyad pa// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam
101b6('bum): bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
101b7('bum): lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher
102a1('bum): brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs
102a2('bum): shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab
102a3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams
102a4('bum): thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs
102a5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ / zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka 'dzam bu
102a6('bum): gling gi sems can bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na pa yang dag
102a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom
102b1('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag
102b2('bum): par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du
102b3('bum): gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
102b4('bum): par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs
102b5('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du
102b6('bum): 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
102b7('bum): yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji
103a1('bum): snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang
103a2('bum): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod
103a3('bum): kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha
103a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos
103a5('bum): rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
103a6('bum): pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems
103a7('bum): dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so/ / kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi
103b1('bum): khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams
103b2('bum): de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang
103b3('bum): ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
103b4('bum): shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab
103b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par
103b6('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
103b7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i
104a1('bum): sems can bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la
104a2('bum): zhig gis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde
104a3('bum): bar gshegs pa mang ngo / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste
104a4('bum): gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
104a5('bum): la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par
104a6('bum): gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs
104a7('bum): par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel
104b1('bum): lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
104b2('bum): tu yang dag par bskul ba byas pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
104b3('bum): yang dag par bskul ba byas na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
104b4('bum): kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur
104b5('bum): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes
104b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa
104b7('bum): nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha
105a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir
105a2('bum): zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams so// kau shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir ldog pa'i
105a3('bum): sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi
105a4('bum): ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du
105a5('bum): tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar
105a6('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
105a7('bum): chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu
105b1('bum): phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka 'di las byung ba ni/ byang chub
105b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir ldog pa'i sa'o/ / kau shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
105b3('bum): la zhig gis phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

105b5('bum): kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu

105b7('bum): ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de bas kyang yongs su rdzogs par

106a2('bum): chen po rnams kyi phyir ldog pa'i sa'o/ / kau shi ka gling chen po bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo

106a6('bum): tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ji ltar bstan pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad
106a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro/ / gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams
106b1('bum): mang du 'phel lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir ldog pa'i sa'o// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byur bu'i sems can phyir ldog pa'i sa la
106b2('bum): bkod pa lta zhog gi/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
106b3('bum): nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don
106b4('bum): dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis
106b5('bum): shig/ chongs shig lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu
106b6('bum): khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
106b7('bum): chos rnams thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

107a2('bum): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du
107a3('bum): 'phel lam/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan
107a4('bum): par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/

107a6('bum): kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro/ / rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe khyod kyis thams cad

107b1('bum): las byung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir ldog pa'i sa'o// kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing gang+ga'i klung gi
107b2('bum): bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis phyir ldog pa'i sa la bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/

107b5('bum): bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan byed pa de'i tshe/ rigs kyi bu khyod shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi tshe/

107b7('bum): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bsgo na/ ches de'i bsod nams mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi phyir ldog pa'i sa'o// kau shi ka gzhan
108a1('bum): yang 'dzam bu gling gi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de

108a6('bum): rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/
108a7('bum): de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di don dang ldan yi ge dang ldan par gzhan la rgya cher brjod de bstan pa dang / bshad de bkrol zhing rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas pa
108b1('bum): dang / 'di skad du tshur rigs kyi bu khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zung shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ tshul bzhin du yid la gyis shig/ ji ltar bstan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nan tan du gyis shig/
